title: Prepare S-Corp Return (Form 1120-S)
description: An S-Corporation needs its annual income tax return prepared.

tasks.description: Input the S-Corp's income, deductions, and shareholder information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly enters all financial and ownership data.

tasks.description: Calculate officer compensation and ensure it is reasonable.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that the salary paid to the owner is appropriate.

tasks.description: Prepare Schedule K-1 for each shareholder, allocating the business's profit and loss.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates accurate K-1s for all shareholders.
